price: 35. Ir jie sako: „Mes turime daugiau turto ir vaikų, ir mes nebūsime baudžiami.“
arabic: وَقَالُواْ نَحۡنُ أَكۡثَرُ أَمۡوَٰلٗا وَأَوۡلَٰدٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqālū naḥnu aktharu amwālan wa-awlādan wamā naḥnu bimuʿadhabīna
